item.description:
Dr. Adiel Tel-Oren (Dr. T), world-wide lecturer and medical consultant, will connect the foods we ingest with the health of our skin. During skin lesion removal (5-10 minutes) you can get answers to your questions about raw vegan diet and remedy skin problems.

Currently, Dr. Tel-Oren is completely booked on line, but you can be squeezed in for an appointment by calling Betsy Bragg at 781-899-6664.

 

To schedule, go to: http://doctorevents.com. pointments are available on this trip (you may get on the waiting list by emailing betsy.bragg6@gmail.com.)

Check “The Truth about Food” on Dr. T’s website

http://www.ecopolitan.com/truth-about-your-food-lectures
item.name: Eating as Nature Intended with Dr. Tel-Oren
